item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国联邦储备委员会提出计划，大幅降低大银行的资本上调幅度
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引知情人士的话报道称，美联储已向其他美国监管机构展示了一份修订计划的大纲，该计划将大幅放宽拜登时代针对华尔街最大贷款机构提出的银行资本建议。【原文：The Federal Reserve has shown other U.S. regulators the outlines of a revised plan that would dramatically relax a Biden-era bank capital proposal for Wall Street's largest lenders, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲奢侈品集团对冲押注，预测中国市场将卷土重来
item.description: 从路威酩轩集团（LVMH）到爱马仕（Hermes）和欧莱雅（L'Oreal）等欧洲奢侈品公司都在试探性地指出中国市场的复苏迹象，但同时也对其最大市场之一在经历两年低迷后的转机持谨慎态度。【原文：Europe's luxury companies from LVMH to Hermes and L'Oreal are tentatively pointing to signs of a revival in China, but are also cautious about calling the turn on one of their biggest markets after a two-year slump.】

item.title: 加密货币交易公司 FalconX 将购买 21 只股票，推动 ETF 发展
item.description: FalconX 周三表示，它将收购加密货币投资管理公司 21shares，这家数字资产交易公司希望扩大其交易所交易基金产品。【原文：FalconX said on Wednesday it will buy crypto investment management firm 21shares, as the digital assets trading firm looks to expand its exchange-traded funds offerings.】

item.title: 据 Axios 报道，Meta 将削减人工智能部门约 600 个职位
item.description: 据 Axios 周三报道，Meta 将从其超级智能实验室（Superintelligence Labs）人工智能部门的数千个职位中裁减约 600 个职位。【原文：Meta is cutting roughly 600 positions out of the several thousand roles within its Superintelligence Labs artificial intelligence unit, Axios reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 金银创纪录大涨后，黄金矿商将迎来丰厚利润
item.description: 在金银价格创纪录反弹的推动下，黄金矿商有望在第三季度实现出色的盈利，投资者正在关注顶级生产商纽蒙特和巴里克最近首席执行官变动的最新情况。【原文：Gold miners are on track to deliver stellar third-quarter earnings, fueled by a record rally in bullion prices, with investors watching for updates on the recent CEO changes at top producers Newmont and Barrick .】

item.title: 独家报道苹果因应用程序商店条款遭欧盟反垄断投诉
item.description: 周三，两个民权组织向欧盟反垄断监管机构投诉苹果公司，称其应用程序商店和设备的条款和条件涉嫌违反了旨在约束大型科技公司的里程碑式规定。【原文：Apple was hit with a complaint to EU antitrust regulators by two civil rights groups on Wednesday over the terms and conditions of its App Store and devices for allegedly breaching landmark rules aimed at reining in Big Tech.】

item.title: 英特尔财报将显示对芯片制造商的一系列投资是否见效
item.description: 英特尔周四公布的第三季度财报将显示，在新任首席执行官陈立武试图重振这家濒临破产的芯片制造商之际，近期一系列备受瞩目的投资能否支撑起其紧张的财务状况。【原文：Intel's third-quarter results on Thursday will show whether a clutch of recent high-profile investments can shore up its strained finances as new CEO Lip-Bu Tan attempts to revive the ailing chipmaker.】

item.title: 北方信托利润超出预期，原因是费用和利息增加
item.description: 北方信托公司（Northern Trust）周三公布的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是市场反弹提升了其相关资产的价值，使其获得了更高的费用。【原文：Northern Trust beat Wall Street expectations for third-quarter profit on Wednesday as it earned higher fees after rallying markets boosted the value of its underlying assets.】

item.title: 穆迪上调年度盈利预测，原因是发行活动强劲，分析实力增强
item.description: 评级机构穆迪（Moody's）周三上调了年度收入和利润预期，原因是其分析部门发展势头强劲，债券发行活动活跃。【原文：Ratings agency Moody's raised its annual revenue and profit forecasts on Wednesday, on the back of strong momentum in its analytics unit and robust bond issuance activity.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司 UnifyApps 融资 5000 万美元，聘请 Sprinklr 创始人担任联席首席执行官
item.description: UnifyApps 是一家将企业系统与人工智能技术连接起来以实现理赔处理等常规任务自动化的初创公司，该公司在 WestBridge Capital 领投的一轮融资中筹集了 5000 万美元，并任命早期投资者拉吉-托马斯（Ragy Thomas）为董事长兼联席首席执行官。【原文：UnifyApps, a startup that connects corporate systems with AI technology to automate routine tasks such as claims processing, has raised $50 million in a WestBridge Capital-led funding round and named early investor Ragy Thomas as chairman and co-CEO.】

item.title: 国防设备需求增长，Teledyne 上调 2025 年利润展望
item.description: Teledyne Technologies 公司周三上调了 2025 年的利润预期，看好其国防电子产品和军用无人机的持续需求。【原文：Teledyne Technologies raised its 2025 profit forecast on Wednesday, betting on sustained demand for its defense electronics and military drones.】

item.title: 优步（Uber）将 "绿色 "重新命名为 "电动"，并为改用电动车的美国司机提供 4,000 美元奖励
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）周三表示，将把其 "优步绿色 "服务重新命名为 "优步电动"，并为司机推出一项4000美元的补助计划，作为该打车巨头推动到2040年实现零排放的一部分。【原文：Uber Technologies said on Wednesday it is rebranding its “Uber Green” service as “Uber Electric” and launching a $4,000 grant program for drivers, as part of the ride-hailing giant's push toward zero-emission rides by 2040.】

item.title: Netflix 业绩下滑，营收预期逊于投资者的高预期
item.description: Netflix 股价在周三的盘前交易中下跌了 7%，此前这家流媒体巨头的第四季度营收展望未能给投资者留下深刻印象，尽管其节目阵容强大，包括《怪奇物语》的最后一季。【原文：Netflix shares fell 7% in premarket trading on Wednesday after the streaming giant's fourth-quarter revenue outlook failed to impress investors despite a strong line-up of shows, including the final season of "Stranger Things".】

item.title: 美国 黄金反弹，Netflix 令人失望
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 捆绑计划和 iPhone 促销提升了销售额，AT&T 用户数量超出预期
item.description: 本周三，AT&T 公司第三季度新增无线用户数超过预期，原因是捆绑计划和围绕最新发布的 iPhone 开展的大力促销活动帮助该公司在竞争激烈的市场中吸引了更多客户。【原文：AT&T added more wireless subscribers than expected in the third quarter on Wednesday, as bundled plans and heavy promotions around the latest iPhone launch helped it attract more customers in a fiercely competitive market.】

item.title: 金属价格上涨，泰克盈利超预期，盎格鲁并购有望实现
item.description: 泰克资源公司（Teck Resources）周三公布的第三季度利润超出预期，原因是铜和锌的价格上涨，尽管其智利Quebrada Blanca铜矿的生产仍受到尾矿工程的限制。【原文：Teck Resources beat third-quarter profit estimates on Wednesday, lifted by higher copper and zinc prices, even as production at its Quebrada Blanca copper mine in Chile remained constrained by tailings work.】

item.title: 美国旅游需求低迷，希尔顿下调 2025 年客房收入预期
item.description: 受美国旅游需求低迷的影响，酒店运营商希尔顿全球下调了 2025 年客房收入预期。【原文：Hotel operator Hilton Worldwide slashed its forecast for 2025 room revenue, hurt by muted U.S. travel demand.】

item.title: 图片报》报道：大众汽车为临时关闭工厂做好员工准备
item.description: 德国《图片报》（Bild）周三报道称，大众汽车公司正在让员工做好临时关闭工厂的准备。【原文：Volkswagen is preparing staff for temporary plant closures, German daily Bild reported on Wednesday, referring to an internal letter from company management warning staff about potential disruptions.】

item.title: 这个假期想要一个 KPop《捉妖记》玩具吗？玩具制造商说，等到明年吧
item.description: Netflix热播剧《KPOP捉妖记》的粉丝们只能在关键的假日购物季结束后才能买到品牌玩具，这对赢得流媒体巨头授权的美泰（Mattel）和孩之宝（Hasbro）来说是个错失良机的机会。【原文：Fans of Netflix's runaway hit "KPop Demon Hunters" will only be able to get their hands on branded toys well after the key holiday shopping season, a missed opportunity for Mattel and Hasbro that have won licensing deals from the streaming giant.】

item.title: 洞察力：美国造船厂和港口因特朗普攻击海上风电而受到冲击
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的竞选活动破坏了近海风能产业，美国造船商和港口运营商因此受到冲击，失去了数亿美元的政府支持，船舶订单消失，价值数十亿美元的投资前途未卜。【原文：U.S. shipbuilders and port operators are getting hit in the fallout from President Donald Trump’s campaign to wipe out the offshore wind industry, suffering hundreds of millions of dollars in lost government support, vanishing vessel orders, and an uncertain future for the billions of dollars' worth of investments.】

item.title: 停发工资：美国政府停摆，6 万名航空安全人员勒紧裤腰带过日子
item.description: 在政府停摆期间，负责维护美国天空安全的 6 万名男女工作人员一直拿不到工资。几名联邦雇员说，如果不能尽快达成拨款协议，许多人将被迫动用储蓄、背上信用卡债务，或打零工来维持生计。【原文：The 60,000 men and women responsible for keeping American skies safe have gone unpaid throughout the government shutdown. Without a funding agreement soon, many will be forced to dip into savings, rack up credit-card debt, or take on part-time jobs to make ends meet, several federal employees said.】

item.title: 美国电动汽车税收抵免即将到期，特斯拉本季度表现强劲
item.description: 由于美国买家急于利用即将到期的7500美元联邦电动汽车税收抵免政策，特斯拉预计将在本周四公布第三季度业绩大增。【原文：Tesla is expected to post a surge in third-quarter results on Thursday, thanks to U.S. buyers rushing to take advantage of an expiring $7,500 federal electric vehicle tax credit.】

item.title: Netflix 业绩令投资者警惕，华尔街期货市场步履维艰
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货走势摇摆不定，投资者在财报季中小心翼翼，Netflix 盈利疲软令市场情绪更加低迷。【原文：U.S. stock index futures wavered on Wednesday as investors treaded carefully through the thick of earnings season, with Netflix's weak profit adding a chill to market sentiment.】

item.title: 前景黯淡预示行业复苏延迟，德州仪器股价下滑
item.description: 德州仪器（Texas Instruments）股价周三在盘前交易中下挫超过 8%，此前该芯片制造商公布的第四季度利润和营收前景不容乐观，加深了市场对模拟芯片市场复苏旷日持久的担忧，因为关税不确定性困扰着整个行业。【原文：Shares of Texas Instruments sank more than 8% on Wednesday in premarket trading, after the chipmaker's downbeat fourth-quarter profit and revenue outlook deepened worries over a drawn-out recovery in the analog chip market as tariff uncertainty plagues the wider industry.】

item.title: 在人工智能被滥用的背景下，印度提出严格的信息技术规则来标记深度假冒产品
item.description: 印度政府周三建议人工智能和社交媒体公司承担新的法律义务，以应对网上日益泛滥的深度伪造内容，规定这些公司必须将此类内容标注为人工智能生成。【原文：India's government on Wednesday proposed new legal obligations for artificial intelligence and social media firms to tackle a growing proliferation of deepfakes online, by mandating them to label such content as AI-generated.】

item.title: 诺和诺德股价下跌，因顶级投资者推动董事会重组
item.description: 周三早盘，诺和诺德股价下跌约 3%，扩大了一天前的跌幅，此前这家 Wegovy 生产商的顶级投资者提议对董事会进行全面改革。【原文：Shares in Novo Nordisk fell around 3% in early trading on Wednesday, extending their losses from a day earlier, after the Wegovy maker's top investor proposed a sweeping board overhaul.】

item.title: 拉布布转售价格下跌的原因可能是供大于求
item.description: 22 岁的卡西迪特-泰拉维博辛（Kasidit Teerawiboosin）借助拉布布的成功，在泰国转售 Pop Mart 的玩具，但他轻松炒卖呲牙怪兽赚钱的日子已经屈指可数了。【原文：Kasidit Teerawiboosin, 22, has ridden the wave of Labubu's success as a reseller in Thailand of toys from Pop Mart , but the days of easily making money flipping the toothy-grinned monsters are numbered.】

item.title: 百度与 PostBus 达成协议，将机器人出租车业务拓展至瑞士
item.description: 百度周三宣布与瑞士PostBus公司合作，在欧洲国家推出Apollo Go自动驾驶汽车服务。【原文：Baidu announced a partnership with Switzerland's PostBus on Wednesday to launch its Apollo Go autonomous vehicle service in the European country, as the Chinese tech firm accelerates a global push of its self-driving business.】

item.title: 尼日利亚部长表示，与非洲的贸易不是 "Minecraft "游戏
item.description: 尼日利亚外交部长说，富裕国家不应将与非洲的贸易视为确保自然资源供应的 "Minecraft "游戏，而应将其视为一种基于相互尊重和非洲发展需要的关系。【原文：Rich countries should not approach trade with Africa as a game of Minecraft in which they secure supplies of natural resources, but rather as a relationship based on mutual respect and the need for Africa to develop, Nigeria's foreign minister said.】

item.title: 福特因后视摄像头问题召回140多万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国汽车监管机构周三表示，由于后视摄像头问题，福特将在美国召回1,448,655辆汽车，该问题可能导致汽车在倒车时图像失真、断断续续或空白。【原文：Ford is recalling 1,448,655 vehicles in the U.S. due to a rearview camera issue that could potentially result in a distorted, intermittent, or blank image when the vehicle is in reverse, the U.S. auto regulator said on Wednesday.】
